text: Sikkim is a state of India, encompassing a former kingdom. Sikkim may also refer to: *Kingdom of Sikkim, the independent kingdom, which became part of India in 1975 *Sikkim (film), a documentary film about the Kingdom of Sikkim, by Satyajit Ray *Sikkim (Lok Sabha constituency), an electoral constituency coextensive with the state *Sikkim football team, the association football team of the kingdom and the state == See also == * Sikhism
title: Sikkim (disambiguation)
